summary: A local reporter and her assembled TV crew go into a school haunted by a horrific past. The team spends the night locked inside the building, capturing any and everything they find.
cast: Valentina Kolaric|Mike McLaughlin|Maurice Mejia|Vince Major|Victor Manso|Jessica Amal Rice|Paul Thomas Arnold|Craig Cranic|Matt Poe|Wesley Rice|Jean-Louis Darville|Caroline Guivarch|Lauren Tess|Amanda Lee Gunnell|Devin Dygert|Ko Wills|Natalie Younan|David Holguin
keywords: evil|dark|talking to the camera|looking at the camera|found footage
title: Classroom 6
